DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of safety and efficacy of SU11248 in patients with metastatic colorectal cancer who have failed selected previous treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Of Safety And Efficacy Of SU11248 In Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Who Have Failed Selected Previous Treatments.
DOC.criteria: Metastatic colorectal cancer Failed selected cancer therapies in the past. Prior treatment with tyrosine kinase inhibitors or VEGF inhibitors other than bevacizumab.
